title: LAHF â€” Load Status Flags into AH Register

fields.name: Description
fields.value: This instruction executes as described above in compatibility mode and legacy mode. It is valid in 64-bit mode only if CPUID.80000001H:ECX.LAHF-SAHF[bit 0] = 1.

footer.text: Thanks to Felix Cloutier for the online x86 reference
